shows.title: Gregory Alan Isakov
shows.desc: With battered guitar in hand, and an understated but shiver-inducing voice telling stories of miles, landscapes, and the search for a sense of place, Gregory combines Sufjan Stevens’ revitalised Americana with Paul Simon’s genius for a memorable lyric. Having relocated from South Africa to Colorado, horticulturist-turned-musician Gregory is creating a stir in the worlds of bluegrass, folk, and beyond.
